fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 403.97 lakh crore compared with Rs 190.08 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 shed 43.05 points or 0.25% to settle at 17,511.25. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, dropped 3.28% to 15.08. Reliance Industries (RIL), ICICI Bank and Adani Enterprises were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
